name: Jurassic Stampede
text: Give to the Kevin Plunder player. You may flip to alter-ego form. Choose: • Exhaust Kevin Plunder and Zabu → remove Jurassic Stampede from the game. • Remove 3 savage counters from Zabu (if you cannot, exhaust Zabu). Discard this obligation.

flavor: Having already proven himself the strongest of Kraven's clones, the Last Son of Kraven has set his sights on more challenging game - you!
name: The Most Dangerous Game
text:
Hinder 1.
Threat cannot be removed from this scheme while Last Son of Kraven is in play.
[crisis]

flavor: “It is time to claim what is rightfully yours” - Kraven the Hunter
name: Last Son of Kraven
text: Villainous. When Defeated: Shuffle this card into the encounter deck. (Ka-Zar's nemesis minion.)

name: Kraven's Lion's Head Vest
text: Attach to Last Son of Kraven, if able. If you cannot attach to the villain. Forced Response: After the attached enemy is attacked, stun the attacker. Hero Action: Exhaust your hero and spend [mental][physical] resources → discard this card.

name: Hunted
text: Attach to your identity. Forced Interrupt: When an enemy initiates an attack against the attached identity, that enemy gets +1 ATK for the attack. Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust your identity and discard 1 card from your hand → discard this card.
